title: Weird Error
body:
Every time I try to start the client I get an error saying:

Failed to load URL "https://riot:4opMQvEeYyAWGYC768j4tA@127.0.0.1:52690/index.html" with error "unknown error code -21" (-21).

The client is all white with no design either. I tried playing on my brothers desktop and it works, but on mines its broken.

replies.body: This white screen error happens if your network is failing to download assets and load the source.  You should go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot and fix any blocks that would prevent the page from loading.  I hope that helps!
